overview: Rina’s (Miles Ocampo) happy and peaceful life takes a turn for the worse when her quarrelsome uncle named Mike (AJ Muhlach) enters her family’s life. Despite her initial objection, Beth (Glenda Garcia) soon lets her brother-in-law live with them as he vows to change for the better. Fortunately, Mike keeps his promise and eventually earns Beth and Macario’s (Alan Paule) trust. Soon after, the couple leaves to handle their business and places Rina under Mike’s care. Much to their horror, Beth and Macario come home to an empty house, clueless where Mike and their beloved daughter are.
title: Hayok (Ipaglaban Mo)
